title: How to connect multiple Bluetooth wireless headphones to my PC or TV - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what your headphones company. For normal headphones you can just connect via Bluetooth. There are Bluetooth headphones that connect only with apple products. For some headphones, you may need to download particular software to connect the headphones When it comes to TV it may depend on the company of the TV and headphones.
Apparently bluetooth transmitters with “dual link” can connect to two headphones at once.
